turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Livonian language.
turn.1: What are the different vowels in the Livonian language?
turn.2: All vowels can be long or short.
turn.3: How are the different vowels written?
turn.4: Short vowels are written as indicated in the table; long vowels are written with an additional macron ("ˉ") over the letter, so, for example, = .
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: The Livonian vowel system is notable for having a "stød" similar to Danish.
turn.8: As in other languages with this feature, it is thought to be a vestige of an earlier pitch accent.
turn.10: Livonian has also a large number of diphthongs, as well as a number of triphthongs.
turn.11: What are some of the diphthongs?
turn.12: These can also occur short or long.
